What is a screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. screenshot let you capture exactly what you‚Äôre seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshot can be extremely helpful. In fact, some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshot often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you‚Äôre really seeing the crazy stuff you‚Äôre seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past.

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don‚Äôt want to risk forgetting.

What is a screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you‚Äôre seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. In fact, some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you‚Äôre really seeing the crazy stuff you‚Äôre seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don‚Äôt want to risk forgetting.

How can I use screenshots?

Screenshots aren‚Äôt just handy, they‚Äôre also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshots can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshots Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they‚Äôve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they‚Äôre having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don‚Äôt just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you‚Äôre talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there‚Äôs less chance that you‚Äôll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What‚Äôs Happening

If you‚Äôve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you‚Äôve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That‚Äôs because not everyone‚Äôs computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it‚Äôs running, the browser version you‚Äôre on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you‚Äôre looking at helps others see exactly what‚Äôs going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you‚Äôre seeing

The best part about screenshot? They‚Äôre easy! As Buffer notes, screenshots are powerful yet simple to use. In fact, it only takes a second to make a screenshot. So start using screenshots today, and download.

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Tangkapan Layar dan Perekam Layar adalah platform lengkap untuk semua kebutuhan Anda. Anda tidak memerlukan banyak ekstensi untuk merekam video atau berbagi tangkapan layar. Pilih saja apa yang Anda butuhkan sekarang!

Buat tutorial video, kursus online singkat, atau pelaporan masalah teknis apa pun dan untuk membangun basis pengetahuan video klien dengan alat pembuatan video dan tangkapan layar kami yang paling canggih. Edit, dan bagikan video atau tangkapan layar yang terlihat profesional secara instan dengan teman atau tim kerja Anda.

Semua Gratis & Tidak perlu masuk!

Berikut adalah beberapa fitur untuk perekam layar dan tangkapan layar:

Ô∏è Tangkapan Layar:
     Tangkapan layar Seluruh Halaman - Tidak peduli berapa panjang halamannya, Anda dapat mengubah halaman menjadi gambar agar mudah diedit dan dibagikan.
    Tangkapan layar Area Terlihat - Tangkap cepat area yang dapat dilihat dari halaman web saat ini.
   Tangkapan layar Area Terpilih - Pilih dan tangkap apa pun yang Anda inginkan.

Ô∏è Perekam Layar:
    Tangkap tab browser, desktop, dan/atau webcam Anda.
    Konversi dari WebM ke MP4.
    Sertakan suara Anda dalam rekaman dengan opsi Mikrofon aktif.
    Tanamkan webcam Anda ke dalam perekaman video layar.
    Mendukung perekaman video dari tab saat ini dengan audio sistem.
    Rekam layar video dari webcam dengan menggunakan fitur webcam perekam screencast.
    Beri anotasi pada rekaman video dengan berbagai bentuk, termasuk panah dan persegi panjang menggunakan perekam video.

Ô∏è Perekam Suara
Mendukung sistem perekaman suara, suara mikrofon, atau keduanya. Anda dapat memilih dengan bebas.

Ô∏è Edit dan Bagikan tangkapan layar atau video layar Anda:
  Publikasikan langsung ke saluran YouTube Anda dengan perekam layar.
  Beri anotasi pada tangkapan layar Anda dengan persegi panjang, lingkaran, panah, garis, dll.
  Tambahkan teks ke tangkapan layar Anda dengan atau tanpa warna latar belakang, ubah font teks dan ukuran font.

You can make a screenshot of any website absolutely for free using our app.

What is a screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you‚Äôre seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. In fact, some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you‚Äôre really seeing the crazy stuff you‚Äôre seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don‚Äôt want to risk forgetting.

How can I use screenshots?

Screenshots aren‚Äôt just handy, they‚Äôre also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshots can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshots Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they‚Äôve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they‚Äôre having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don‚Äôt just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you‚Äôre talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there‚Äôs less chance that you‚Äôll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What‚Äôs Happening

If you‚Äôve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you‚Äôve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That‚Äôs because not everyone‚Äôs computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it‚Äôs running, the browser version you‚Äôre on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you‚Äôre looking at helps others see exactly what‚Äôs going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you‚Äôre seeing

The best part about screenshots? They‚Äôre easy! As Buffer notes, screenshots are powerful yet simple to use. In fact, it only takes a second to make a screenshot. So start using screenshots today, and download a

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Screenshots can be useful for many situations: 

-Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
-Showcasing software for a review.
-Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
-Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
-Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

How to Take Screenshots

You don't need special software to take a picture of the screen because screenshot functionality is built into all current operating systems. Some devices even capture specific portions of the screen.

Screen Capture Programs

Many graphics programs, also have built-in screen-capture capabilities. Dedicated screen capture software might offer several benefits:

Automatically name and save screenshots to a specific folder.

Auto-scroll functions to capture long documents like web pages that don't fit on the screen.

Timed captures to add a delay while you prepare the workspace before capturing.

Markup tools that add callouts, arrows, shapes, and text annotations to screenshots.

Options to include or exclude the mouse cursor.
There is screen recording software available that captures all of the activity on a computer monitor and turns it into a video file.
